name: Nakaishi Wars
description:
With the advent of jump-drive technology, Man's dream of exploring the galaxy has come at last. This claimed many lives, but, not as many as when they came across the Dohimquildsaetcqu. Fighting in mechanized armored suits, humanity was long at a large disadvantage, it seemed like it would take a miracle to just survive. The discovery of Galxium, a sturdy mineral that could more easily withstand attacks than more traditional materials, certainly helped. However, humanity was still very much in dire straights.

The Kamiyama is one of many vessels in the Terran Alliance right at the front lines of this war. Her mission is to verify the existence, or nonexistence, of the God Nakaishi; an armored suit of such exceptional power that it could bring the tide of war to humanity's side.
